meanings.definition: Worn or used on the inside.
meanings.sent1: The old, inworn sweater felt cozy against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The inworn shoes showed signs of frequent use.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his inworn socks had become part of his feet.
meanings.sent4: The inworn paths in the forest led to hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The inworn memories of childhood brought a sense of nostalgia.

meanings.definition: Worn or used in the interior.
meanings.sent1: The inworn car seats had a comfortable feel.
meanings.sent2: The inworn upholstery of the couch showed its age.
meanings.sent3: The inworn wallpaper gave the room a vintage charm.
meanings.sent4: The inworn carpet in the hallway muffled footsteps.
meanings.sent5: The inworn linings of the curtains added a touch of elegance.
